detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a lace section over the shoulders and a wide neckline with gathers front and back.

Cargo trousers in soft washed cotton twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 1½-10Y), a fake fly and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave. Stand-up collar with gathers front and back, a V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top and flutter sleeves. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in mesh embroidered with sequins. Opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed neckline, short sleeves and a sewn-on bow at the front.
Scarf in an airy linen weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 90x180 cm.
Boots in cotton twill with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and chunky block heels. Lining and moulded insoles in cotton canvas. Heel 7 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with a rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Cap in woven fabric with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style with short slits in the sides.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted calf-length skirt in a rib knit with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved, calf-length dress in stretch viscose jersey with a seam at the waist with a decorative knot details and draped wrapover skirt. Lined.

Fleece-lined set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft cable knit. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, small imitation suede appliqué on the front, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Sizes 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
Thin metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants in hammered metal. Diameter 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch, patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist and concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and straight legs with creases that taper to the hem.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Bohemian blouse in soft, slub cotton jersey with a woven elasticated flounce with broderie anglaise at the top.

City shorts in a stretch cotton weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Waist with an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides, side pockets, welt back pockets and short slits in the sides. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Straight-cut, calf-length shirt dress in soft, washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Flap chest pockets with a concealed button, side pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Longer shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in a sturdy, slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a press-stud and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Non-wired nursing bras in soft microfibre with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Jumper for a dog in a jacquard knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and at the back.
Checked shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, flap front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lightly padded all-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with press-studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Polyester padding.
Sun visor with a fabric top, braided visor and an elastic strap at the back.
Hard smartphone case in marble-patterned plastic. Fits iPhone 6/6S/7/8.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and front pockets.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping weave with a draped front with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative covered button. Low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that can be made slimmer with the help of a button at the cuffs. Detachable, soft belt in grosgrain with plastic D-rings. Unlined.
Long jumper in a soft, textured knit with a ribbed polo neck, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs and a seam at the waist with pleats. Unlined.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in the side. Soft linings and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and high-cut legs.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed cotton jersey. Adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton twill trousers with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and tie belt. Fake fly, discreet side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Brazilian briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.

Baby Exclusive. T-shirt and a pair of leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with overlocked edges. T-shirt with short raglan sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Jacket in water-repellent, windproof functional fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Diagonal welt side pockets and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Short-sleeved top in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover and flounced trims. Seam with a drawstring at the waist.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length, straight-cut dress in satin with beaded embroidery and sparkly stones, a low stand-up collar, V-neck opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves.

Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back. Wide elastic trim and two frills at the hem, and adjustable hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, pearly buttons at the front, flap front pockets and a gently tapered waist. Lined.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
A-line dress in glittery, patterned tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short cap sleeves. Satin lining.
Jacket in coated cotton twill with a detachable, pile-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with faux fur pompoms on the top, a turned-up hem, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Top in slub cotton jersey with an interactive appliqué on the front, short cap sleeves, narrow ribbing around the neckline and short slits at the sides.
